jbt.execution.task.composite
Class ExecutionRandomSequence

java.lang.Object
  jbt.execution.core.ExecutionTask
      jbt.execution.task.composite.ExecutionComposite
          jbt.execution.task.composite.ExecutionRandomSequence
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITaskListener
public class ExecutionRandomSequence
extends ExecutionComposite

ExecutionRandomSequence is the ExecutionTask that knows how to run a ModelRandomSequence.

Author:
Ricardo Juan Palma Dur√°n

Field Detail

activeChild

private ExecutionTask activeChild
Currently active child.

activeChildIndex

private int activeChildIndex
The currently active child of the sequence. This integer is an index over the elements of order.

children

private java.util.List<ModelTask> children
The list of children of this task.

order

private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> order
List storing a sequence of integers with the order in which the children of this task must be evaluated. This list is computed when the task is spawned.

Constructs an ExecutionRandomSequence to run a specific ModelRandomSequence.

Parameters:
modelTask - the ModelRandomSequence to run.
executor - the BTExecutor that will manage this ExecutionRandomSequence.
parent - the parent ExecutionTask of this task.

internalTick

protected ExecutionTask.Status internalTick()
Checks the status of the currently active child. If it is running, ExecutionTask.Status.RUNNING is returned. If it has finished in failure, ExecutionTask.Status.FAILURE is returned. If it has finished successfully, it tries to spawn the next child (and returns ExecutionTask.Status.RUNNING). If it was the last child of the sequence, returns ExecutionTask.Status.SUCCESS.

Specified by:
internalTick in class ExecutionTask
Returns:
the status of the task after being ticked.
See Also:
ExecutionTask.internalTick()
